column4: can someone help me wtih a cron job? What USER does cron run as? How do I set the priveleges for the user who is cron?
hello - can someone help me with a cron job? How do you know what user a CRON job runs as, or set the priviledges?
Whose crontab are you editing? Each user has one (by default in Ubuntu).
i just set a simple crontab, i did crontab -e , the job is */1 * * * * /usr/bin/python /home/me/myscript.py
If you did that as your user, then the script will run as you.  If you wanted it to run as root, then you'd have to do sudo crontab -e
